title: Fortnite x Avengers - Kinda Funny Games Daily 04.22.19
description:
Get your first refill pack free at http://quip.com/games

Boost is only available at http://experian.com/kfgames.

Get 10% off your first order at http://brooklinen.com with promo code: GAMES

Andrea and Greg talk about what Fortnite's Endgame content could be and where Crystal Dynamics' Avengers project is.

Time Stamps - 
00:02:29 - Housekeeping
Cooking with Greggy is back today on patreon.com/kindafunnygames!
IGN Esports Showdown is on IGN today @ 2 p.m. PT
Vancouver Meet and Greet - May 4th - kindafunny.com/events
The Roper Report   -

00:13:53 - Assassin's Creed Unity players review-bomb Steam page with positivity

00:26:20 - Experian

Reader mail   -
00:29:15 - “Today is Earth Day. As content creators do you guys ever consider the carbon footprint you are leaving?” - 2038 Pokémon CEO
00:37:37 - “Have you guys considered a DnD centric podcast like Critical Role?” - Rabs
00:41:52 - Squad Up: Rabs - EbonyRabby on Uplay - Division 2
00:42:50 - Required Content
- God of War: Raising Kratos: https://youtu.be/i176OFFGvV4
- Riding With Red Dead Online Role Players: https://www.ign.com/articles/2019/04/22/riding-with-red-dead-online-role-players-was-my-best-ever-multiplayer-experience
00:47:42 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg & David Jagneaux
